Uses of Class
org.nlpcraft.client.NCClientBuilder

    • Uses of NCClientBuilder in org.nlpcraft.client

      Methods in org.nlpcraft.client that return NCClientBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NCClientBuilder NCClientBuilder.setBaseUrl(String baseUrl)
      Sets custom base URL of the REST server for this builder.
      NCClientBuilder NCClientBuilder.setClientSupplier(Supplier<org.apache.http.impl.client.CloseableHttpClient> httpCliSup)
      Sets custom HTTP client for this builder.
      NCClientBuilder NCClientBuilder.setEmbeddedProbe(boolean embeddedMode)
      Sets embedded probe mode flag.
      NCClientBuilder NCClientBuilder.setLogin(String email, String pwd)
      Sets custom login user account.
      NCClientBuilder NCClientBuilder.setRequestConfig(org.apache.http.client.config.RequestConfig reqCfg)
      Sets the custom request config for this builder.
